sent.orig: If you don't have ping, any other network command, like finger or telnet, will do.
sent.trans: 如果你没有ping命令，使用另外的网络命令如finger或telnet,也是可以的。

sent.orig: Right thumb, middle finger, ring finger, little finger and the rosette is slightly incomplete.
sent.trans: 右手拇指、中指、无名指、小指及莲座稍有残缺。

sent.orig: Play on your sensitive finger pads, your finger pads help you make sumptuous, controlled tones.
sent.trans: 用你敏感的手指肉垫弹琴帮助你产生丰富，自己控制的音响。

sent.orig: The longer the ring finger and the shorter index finger, the greater the testosterone exposure.
sent.trans: 无名指越长食指越短，睾丸素暴露度越高。

sent.orig: Electronic finger-finger blood pressure monitor in the position measurement of blood pressure, not recommended.
sent.trans: 手指式电子血压计在手指部位测量血压，不推荐使用。
